app.name: End-User Service 2
app.long_description: End-User Service 2 enables support teams to efficiently and securely manage end-user information directly within Zendesk. The app allows you to selectively show or hide user fields, verify and set primary email addresses, add or remove user tags, change a user's language, and unlock suspended users. All changes are applied in real time, ensuring that information remains up to date â€” without granting full access to Zendesk profiles or compromising sensitive data areas.
app.installation_instructions:
1. Install End-User Service 2 in your Zendesk account.
2. Open the app via the user sidebar.
3. Manage user fields: The app automatically loads all relevant fields; review and adjust the visible fields as needed.
4. Manage email addresses: Select an email and click 'Set as Primary', 'Verify', or 'Remove'.
5. Update user tags: Select tags from the list and click 'Add' or 'Remove'.
6. Change language: Select the desired language and click 'Change Language'.
7. Unlock suspended users: Click 'Unlock User' to restore access.
8. All changes are applied directly in Zendesk and updated instantly.
